course.title: MAT 5152 Topology II (3 units)
course.desc: Covering spaces, homology via the Eilenberg-Steenrod axioms, applications, construction of a homology functor. This course is equivalent to MATH 5206 at Carleton University.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 3143 and MAT 5151 (MATH 3100 and MATH 5205).
